Articles.Content:
So I just looked at

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5QaJWgo8QrY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
, and would like some assistance in figuring out which mods Scott Manley is using in this video.
The addons I was able to identify are:

Kerbal Engineer

Ferram Aerospace Research

Planet shine(I assume)

I couldn't figure out what is being used for:

The clouds

The auroras

The dust on Minmus

The angle-of-attack stuff during landing at KSC

The parts

If someone can tell me which mods are being used in the linked video, that would be really great.

The clouds - **EVE**

The auroras - **EVE**

The dust on Minmus - **EVE**

The angle-of-attack stuff during landing at KSC - **FAR**

The parts - **Interstellar**

[Interstellar Quest Mod List](http://lmgtfy.com/?q=Interstellar+Quest+Mod+List)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-05T14:33:26Z" title="06/05/2015 02:33  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 5, 2015</time> by Tex\_NL**
Also the spaceplanes parts are from B9 Aerospace.
